title: How to Make Indoor S'mores

steps.headline: Clean your fireplace, just so you won't have any ashes in your s'mores.
Arrange the graham crackers and the chocolate on a large cookie sheet.
steps.description: Multiply the number of people by 3, or just ask everybody how many they want.

steps.headline: Put the marshmallow on a roasting stick, and hold the marshmallow a few inches above the flames.
When one side of the marshmallow turns a light golden brown, or however dark you want it, rotate the marshmallow.
steps.description: Repeat until all of your marshmallow is as dark or golden as wanted.

steps.headline: When the marshmallow is a nice light golden brown, put it on the chocolate, and mash it with the other graham cracker.

text: Clean your fireplace, just so you won't have any ashes in your s'mores.  Arrange the graham crackers and the chocolate on a large cookie sheet. Multiply the number of people by 3, or just ask everybody how many they want. Put the marshmallow on a roasting stick, and hold the marshmallow a few inches above the flames.  When one side of the marshmallow turns a light golden brown, or however dark you want it, rotate the marshmallow. Repeat until all of your marshmallow is as dark or golden as wanted. When the marshmallow is a nice light golden brown, put it on the chocolate, and mash it with the other graham cracker.  Finished.
